content.rendered:
Experience Requirements:

  • Overall, 10 years of experience
  • Years of Experience: Five (5) or more years of cloud architecture or cloud enterprise experience
  • Proficiency with eMASS, ACAS, STIG Viewer, Cloud Technologies
  • Demonstrate technical knowledge and experience with cloud assessment methodologies, architectures, risks, vulnerabilities, and threats.
  • Demonstrate experience in applying and evaluating the RMF to cloud-based providers and their offerings
  • Demonstrate knowledge of and experience with FedRAMP and DoD IA policies, NIST 800 series, CNSS 1253, CNSSP 32, and the DoD 8500 series.
  • Demonstrate knowledge of and experience in the DoD CC SRG and FedRAMP A&A guidance.
  • Demonstrate the ability to apply the appropriate FedRAMP and DoD-approved architectures, programs, standards, and guidelines.

Demonstrate the ability to understand and articulate systems, applications, and services, and be able to identify system functions and relationships that support the goals and objections of the current and future Cloud efforts throughout the enterprise.

Education Requirement:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT-related field preferred)
